valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 9 Nov 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 10 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low Bailey 994 moving steadily west and losing its identity by midday tomorrow. New low expected Hebrides 994 by same time
